title: Contact Us
description: Get in touch with Horizon Community Foundation. We'd love to hear from you.

blocks.title: Contact Us
blocks.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you

items.question: What are your office hours?
items.answer: Our community center is open Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM, and Saturday, 9 AM to 2 PM. We're closed on Sundays and major holidays.

items.question: How can I sign up for a program?
items.answer: You can register for programs through our website or by visiting our community center. Some programs have specific enrollment periods, so contact us for current availability.

items.question: Do you offer virtual programs?
items.answer: Yes! We offer several programs in virtual format, including our Digital Skills workshops and some Adult Education classes. Check our Events page for current offerings.

items.question: How can my organization partner with Horizon?
items.answer: We love partnering with local businesses and organizations! Contact us to discuss sponsorship opportunities, employee volunteer programs, or collaborative initiatives.

items.question: Are donations tax-deductible?
items.answer: Yes, Horizon Community Foundation is a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. All donations are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.
